text: @BrianKempGA YOU ARE NOT in this with the rest of us!! YOU have #PPE in YOUR hometown! WHERE are OUR #Masks here in MIDDLE Georgia?? My grandbaby is sick now and HER tests results NOW won't be back for ANOTHER week because of #Florida rise in #COVID19! You FAILED to prepare our state!
